actions.committee: House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.

official_title: Resolution to authorize an investigation by the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to learn who is responsible for the unauthorized release of the report "Expenditures of Federal Funds in Support of Presidential Properties" and to impose penalties against such person or persons.

summary.text: Authorizes an investigation by the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to learn who is responsible for the unauthorized release of the report "Expenditures of Federal Funds in Support of Presidential Properties" and to impose penalties against such person or persons.

titles.title: Resolution to authorize an investigation by the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to learn who is responsible for the unauthorized release of the report "Expenditures of Federal Funds in Support of Presidential Properties" and to impose penalties against such person or persons.
